entry.title: sveltia/sveltia-cms: Netlify/Decap CMS alternative. Fast, lightweight, Git-based headless CMS. Modern UX, first-class i18n support, mobile support + 100s of improvements. Open source & free.

entry.content: Lightweight JavaScript overlay progress bar as a singleton utility

entry.title: SamarthKulkarni20/keyed-batched-items-accumulator: A lightweight utility for Node.js projects that accumulates items into fixed-size batches per key, preserving insertion order within each key. Streams items directly into their respective batches at runtime, eliminating the overhead of post-processing 1D arrays into chunks. It abstracts key-based batch management.
entry.content: A lightweight utility for Node.js projects that accumulates items into fixed-size batches per key, preserving insertion order within each key. Streams items directly into their respective batches at runtime, eliminating the overhead of post-processing 1D arrays into chunks. It abstracts key-based batch management.

entry.title: fsegall/zk-threshold-proof: üîê A lightweight Zero-Knowledge SDK to prove that a private value is greater than or equal to a threshold ‚Äî without revealing the actual value. Built using Circom and snarkjs, this SDK is suitable for decentralized applications that require selective disclosure with strong privacy guarantees.
entry.content: üîê A lightweight Zero-Knowledge SDK to prove that a private value is greater than or equal to a threshold ‚Äî without revealing the actual value. Built using Circom and snarkjs, this SDK is suitable for decentralized applications that require selective disclosure with strong privacy guarantees.
